data.name: Unpetrified
data.detailed_description:
Join the game's community on Discord to get first hand updates on the development:




Unpetrified is a story-driven exploration game in which flora and fauna react to the main character's emotions, where you help animals in need and can escape your busy everyday life, all presented in a simplified stylized visual style.

Enjoy an emotion-driven story by exploring diverse regions, enhanced by a world that changes according to the main characters emotions.

Key Features

  • Enjoy an impactful story in a world that changes according to your character's emotions.
  • Unique interactions with flora and fauna through a feature we call "Aura Impulse".
  • Solve various engaging puzzles and uncover a deep and rich backstory.
  • Experience the world and narrative only through visual and audio elements.
  • A game to relax, enjoy and reflect.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Play as a sweet, curious stone creature, experience different emotions and see, hear, and feel how the world changes around you. Explore a world filled with flora and fauna, where you interact with your surroundings in unique ways in this single-player narrative adventure.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x64
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 700 Series
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: -
  • Additional Notes: -

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x64
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 700 Series
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: -
  • Additional Notes: -
